name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easy Autofill: Secure Profile-Based Fill Out and Form Filling

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Effortlessly auto-fill your form data across websites. Secure, easy to use, and free to try.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🚀 Easy Autofill: Secure & Effortless Form Filling

Tired of manually filling out the same forms over and over? Whether it's signing up for accounts, checking out from shopping carts, or completing job applications, Easy Autofill is the autofill app that saves you time by securely saving your form data and filling it in with just one click. If you're looking for a reliable and secure way to autofill forms in your Chrome browser, this is the extension for you.

✨ Why Easy Autofill?

💳 One-Time Payment: Pay once, enjoy forever—no monthly fees.
🔒 Secure Storage: Your data is encrypted, and password fields are never saved unless you allow it.
📂 Multiple Profiles: Easily switch between personal, work, and other profiles.

With Easy Autofill, you get an easy-to-use autofill software designed specifically for autofill web forms across any site.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

🔥 Key Features:

📑 Unlimited Profiles: Save and manage different sets of data for various form-filling needs, perfect for automatic form filler tasks.
🔐 Encrypted Storage: Your information is always safe with us, secured by advanced encryption.
🆓 Free Plan with 10 Autofills: Try the free plan, which allows 10 autofill actions per day. Upgrade to unlock unlimited automatic fill capabilities!

Whether you need an autofill chrome extension for personal use or for frequent form submissions at work, Easy Autofill is the perfect chrome extension for your needs.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

💡 How Does Easy Autofill Compare?

⚡ Lightning Autofill alternative: Many users were disappointed when Lightning Autofill moved to a subscription model. With Easy Autofill, you pay once and enjoy unlimited autofills with no recurring fees. Your data is encrypted, and we don’t store or track sensitive information.

🧠 Magical alternative: While Magical is a more comprehensive automation tool with additional features like AI-driven workflow automation, Easy Autofill is designed for users who want a simple, fast, and reliable chrome extensions autofill solution without the complexity.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

💸 Plans & Pricing

🆓 Free Trial: Get started with 10 autofill actions per day.

💎 Premium Plan: For just $9.50, unlock unlimited autofill web forms and premium features. No subscriptions, just a one-time payment. It’s one of the most cool chrome extensions available for simplifying your fill out form tasks.

🔒 Privacy & Security Your privacy is our priority. Easy Autofill does not track your browsing activity or share any personal data. All your information stays local to your device, and password fields are never saved unless you explicitly allow it. Whether you’re working on a form fill up online or filling out a checkout form, your data is always secure.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

❓ Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)

🤔 Isn’t browser autofill enough?
Browser autofill is limited to certain fields like addresses and passwords. Easy Autofill goes beyond, saving and auto-filling text fields, checkboxes, and more across any form. It's a more robust solution for autofill in Chrome browser users who need workflow automation for repetitive tasks.
🛡️ Are you tracking my data?
No, Easy Autofill does not track, share, or store your data externally. Your data remains private and secure on your device, making it the perfect autofill software for privacy-conscious users.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

🎉 Stop wasting time on repetitive data entry. Install Easy Autofill today and take control of your form fill up tasks with the ultimate autofill chrome solution.

Changelog:
1.4: Add feature: deletion of profiles from settings page
1.5: Improve support of more google form fields: Multiple choice, Checkboxes, Rating, Linear Scale
